arg.name: ur_type
arg.description: Type/series of used UR robot.

arg.name: runtime_config_dir
arg.description: Base path prefix for runtime_configs directory on bÂ»controlled box.

arg.name: robot_ip
arg.description: IP address by which the robot can be reached.

arg.name: safety_limits
arg.description: Enables the safety limits controller if true.

arg.name: safety_pos_margin
arg.description: The margin to lower and upper limits in the safety controller.

arg.name: safety_k_position
arg.description: k-position factor in the safety controller.

arg.name: joint_limit_params_file
arg.description: Config file containing the joint limits (e.g. velocities, positions) of the robot.

arg.name: kinematics_params_file
arg.description: The calibration configuration of the actual robot used.

arg.name: physical_params_file
arg.description: Config file containing the physical parameters (e.g. masses, inertia) of the robot.

arg.name: visual_params_file
arg.description: Config file containing the visual parameters (e.g. meshes) of the robot.

arg.name: description_file
arg.description: URDF/XACRO description file with the robot.

arg.name: tf_prefix
arg.description: tf_prefix of the joint names, useful for multi-robot setup. If changed, also joint names in the controllers' configuration have to be updated.

arg.name: use_mock_hardware
arg.description: Start robot with mock hardware mirroring command to its states.

arg.name: mock_sensor_commands
arg.description: Enable mock command interfaces for sensors used for simple simulations. Used only if 'use_mock_hardware' parameter is true.

arg.name: headless_mode
arg.description: Enable headless mode for robot control

arg.name: initial_joint_controller
arg.description: Initially loaded robot controller.

arg.name: activate_joint_controller
arg.description: Activate loaded joint controller.

arg.name: launch_rviz
arg.description: Launch RViz?

arg.name: launch_dashboard_client
arg.description: Launch Dashboard Client?

arg.name: use_tool_communication
arg.description: Only available for e series!

arg.name: tool_parity
arg.description: Parity configuration for serial communication. Only effective, if use_tool_communication is set to True.

arg.name: tool_baud_rate
arg.description: Baud rate configuration for serial communication. Only effective, if use_tool_communication is set to True.

arg.name: tool_stop_bits
arg.description: Stop bits configuration for serial communication. Only effective, if use_tool_communication is set to True.

arg.name: tool_rx_idle_chars
arg.description: RX idle chars configuration for serial communication. Only effective, if use_tool_communication is set to True.

arg.name: tool_tx_idle_chars
arg.description: TX idle chars configuration for serial communication. Only effective, if use_tool_communication is set to True.

arg.name: tool_device_name
arg.description: File descriptor that will be generated for the tool communication device. The user has be be allowed to write to this location. Only effective, if use_tool_communication is set to True.

arg.name: tool_tcp_port
arg.description: Remote port that will be used for bridging the tool's serial device. Only effective, if use_tool_communication is set to True.

arg.name: tool_voltage
arg.description: Tool voltage that will be setup. 0 being a conservative value that won't destroy anything.

arg.name: reverse_ip
arg.description: IP that will be used for the robot controller to communicate back to the driver.

arg.name: script_command_port
arg.description: Port that will be opened to forward URScript commands to the robot.

arg.name: reverse_port
arg.description: Port that will be opened to send cyclic instructions from the driver to the robot controller.

arg.name: script_sender_port
arg.description: The driver will offer an interface to query the external_control URScript on this port.

arg.name: trajectory_port
arg.description: Port that will be opened for trajectory control.
